text: drb allah mathalana lhal alkafarat - fi mkhaltthm almuslimin wqrbhm minhum wmeashrthm lhm, wa'ana dhlk la yanfaeuhum lkfrhm ballh- bihal zawjat nabiin allah nwh, wazawjat nabiin allah lwt: hayth kanata fi esmt ebdayn min eibadina salhyn, fwqet minhuma alkhianat lahuma fi aldyn, faqad kanata kafrtyn, falam yadfae hdhan alrswlan ean zwjtyhma min eadhab allah shyyana, waqil llzwjtyn: adkhula alnaar mae aldaakhilin fyha. wafi darab hdha almathal dalil ealaa 'ana alqrb min alanbya', walsalhyn, la yufid shayyana mae aleamal alsyiy
